name: The Soup Swindler
description:
A game made for the Paint Jam 2020.

The world has been overun by locusts, who have destroyed all the food in the world except tinned soup. In order to prevent starving to death you have decided to break into a well-guarded house in order to steal their supply.

You can crouch behind grey blocks to hide. Enemies can't see as well in the dark.

Made by StormCat

SOON TO BE UPDATED/IMPROVED (due to lack of time in jam)
